metadata.name: Lil Frex
metadata.description: This summer, we will be welcoming the best version of "Lil Frex" to the world. We are so excited to become parents and are so grateful to Web3 for creating opportunities for us to make this point in life more possible. Up until this point, I've been known as Lil Frex. Now, I'm passing that title on to our little one. This piece represents that transfer from me to him - a representation of two eras joining as one. We are prepared to learn so much more about ourselves, our family, and the world through the eyes of our own Lil Frex. Thank you all for supporting us in this journey.
